text:
[Verse]
Raindrops falling all around
Feet are tapping to the sound
Smiles wide never coming down
Dancing in this little town

[Verse 2]
Clouds are gathering up high
Splash in puddles we defy
Hands held reaching for the sky
Laughing as the world goes by

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain oh can't you see
Joy in every step we take so free
Living in the moment just you and me
Dancing in the rain so wild and free

[Verse 3]
Shoes are soaked but we don't care
Wind is blowing through our hair
Hearts are light no burdens to bear
In this storm we find our prayer

[Bridge]
Lightning flashes bright and bold
Thunder stories being told
Love shines bright against the cold
In your arms I find gold

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain oh can't you see
Joy in every step we take so free
Living in the moment just you and me
Dancing in the rain so wild and free
title: Dancing in the Rain
